title: The Extinction Trials
description: THE END... IS ONLY THE BEGINNING.After a mysterious global event known only as "The Change," six strangers wake up in an underground research facility where they learn that they're part of the Extinction Trialsâ€”a scientific experiment to restart the human race.But the Extinction Trials hides a very big secret.And so does the world outside.
author: A.G. Riddle
